items.title: Pignio
items.content_html:
Pignio

Pignio is your personal self-hosted media pinboard, built on top of flat-file storage.

items.title: Blog
items.content_html:
Blog

Welcome to the Pignio Docs Blog. Here various feature updates, as well as practical case studies in Pignio usage, are showcased. Enjoy!

items.title: Collections
items.content_html: Collections in Pignio, like boards in Pinterest, allow for many items to be grouped together. They are essentially like folders, except user-specific, not de...

items.title: Filesystem structure
items.content_html: Being a flat-file software system, Pignio stores all its data into individual files on disk for all its features. This happens in a folder aptly called `data...

items.title: HTTP JSON API
items.content_html: Pignio contains a work-in-progress HTTP JSON API, partly built for use inside the web frontend and partly intended for integration with third-party apps impl...

items.title: Items
items.content_html:
In Pignio, an item is a single, atomic piece of media or non-media which the app supports for viewing, pinning to collections, and so on.
